creator: renuka_sethi@hotmail.com
text:
in tomcat 4.1.12 after a while working for 1 minute whenever a request is 
forwarded to another page it takes forever

This is usually either a tuning issue or a programming(webapp) issue. Please use
tomcat-user to debug. Otherwise, a concrete consistently reproducable test case
will need to be provided.
creator: funkman@joedog.org
